message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal interests. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $1,250,000. I am confident that this price reflects its true worth while leaving room for negotiation, should you find it within your budget. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
